Class TopologyInfo

java.lang.Object
org.infinispan.distribution.topologyaware.TopologyInfo
public class TopologyInfo extends Object
This class holds the topology hierarchy of a cache's members and estimates for owned segments.
Since:
5.2
Author:
Dan Berindei
